content: get ready to create the most adorable bunny squish with this easy crochet pattern perfect for beginners this pattern includes detailed written instructions and a video tutorial to guide you through each step worked in the round and seamed this pattern results in a cute bunny approximately 10 across the super bulky bernat blanket yarn used ensures a soft and squishy finished product that will be loved by all **unique features-** easy level pattern suitable for beginners includes written instructions and video tutorial for guidance worked in the round and seamed construction uses super bulky yarn for a soft and squishy finish **materials needed-** 250 yds **bernat blanket** https //amzn to/42idj5n 6 - super bulky color a whipped cream 2 balls color b terracotta 5 yards **10 round microbead pillow pink ** https //amzn to/3arh99y **fiberfill** https //amzn to/38aap13 **safety eyes - 24mm** https //amzn to/3qjgplf **safety nose - 15mm** https //amzn to/3laftmc **faux fur pom** https //amzn to/2ouyl3m **stitch markers** https //amzn to/4cmjdih **sewing thread** https //amzn to/4cmjitx - white
